newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: FORECAST-Swiss banks expect Q1 GDP to remain slow.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Swiss banks expect Q1 GDP to remain slow.

text.p: Swiss banks see a recovery in the domestic economy taking off slowly, a fact likely to be reflected in first quarter gross domestic product (GDP) data.
Banks surveyed by Reuters forecast first-quarter GDP on average to show a slight gain of 0.3 percent versus a weak fourth quarter.
Compared with first quarter 1996, first quarter 1997 GDP is forecast down 0.4 percent based on an average forecast.
The banks, on average, forecast 1997 GDP up 0.4 percent and 1998 GDP to show a rise of 1.8 percent.
